title: RIOT! i have 1347/1350 for skin, need 3 RP!
body:
seriously what? how does one even even on a 7 for rp, you guys must have had some weird specials going on in the past cause now its just screwed over my balance

but really i just added $10 to my account to buy a skin - 1350 RP, only to find out im short 3 RP....3 !!!!! RP!!! lol 1347.....fml

can do a fellow gamer a hook up, a juicy 3 RP hook up

o ummm...sad story right!, i have cancer, mum is dead, cat got run over..errrrr last week i died...my foot is itchy..one time i sneezed so hard i farted.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I hear that [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) likes to give out RP, but you have to provide them something in exchange.

Word on the street is that they like League related MSPaint art (Or even professional art, your choice).
